        name: aarch64-on-premise
    ppc64le:
    -   enabled: false
        max_concurrent_builds: 4
        name: ppc64le-on-premise
    -   enabled: true
        max_concurrent_builds: 40

content_versions:

group_manifests: true
image_equal_labels:
-   - description
    - io.k8s.description
image_label_info_url_format: https://access.example.com/containers/#/{authoritative-source-url}/{name}/images/{version}-{release}

    distribution-scope: private
